casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 14, 2011

[Cite as 06/14/2011 Case Announcements #2, 2011-Ohio-2864.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0975. Diplomate Health Care, L.L.C. v. Coury.

Summit App. No. 25181, 2011-Ohio-2767. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right.

Upon consideration of appellants’ motion to stay the court of appeals’ judgment, it is ordered by the court that the appellee shall file a response to the motion by June 16, 2011.
